channel.title: Client error code. HELP!
channel.description:
When i tried to run my client it says "cant find class gui"
but gui is there.... Whats wrong?

item.title: Client error code. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:11, topic:428633”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=531324.msg3881974#msg3881974 date=1326095117]

How about fix the errors yourself. You will learn much more from fixing the errors yourself, than going to a source that has no errors.

The most important thing about programming, that most people fail to realize, is problem solving.

He downloaded HybridPvP with a missing bracket. He can’t fix that.
I mean I probably could but my methods are “un-ethical” in a sense.

You understand nothing about problem solving.

Tell us, what are these “unethical” changes?
[/quote]
Well I don’t know how you code or program.
But if I ever get the missing bracket error I first read the last line in it for what file it is in (it does tell you). Then I open that file in Notepad++ and search “{” and “}”
One will show with less brackets then the other. I just search and compare where the the jump between code is.
Say you have an open bracket missing.
You look at the open brackets in the client and compare to the close ones.
when you see two close brackets show up no open bracket in between there’s your error.[/quote]

I was not referring to that.[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:428633”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=531324.msg3881945#msg3881945 date=1326089013]
How about fix the errors yourself. You will learn much more from fixing the errors yourself, than going to a source that has no errors.

The most important thing about programming, that most people fail to realize, is problem solving.
[/quote]
He downloaded HybridPvP with a missing bracket. He can’t fix that.
I mean I probably could but my methods are “un-ethical” in a sense.[/quote]

Saying that he can’t fix the error. You also suggested that, because there was an error with the client he’s using, that he use a different client (namely the one you are working on), rather than trying to fix the existing error. By doing this, you are contributing to the spoonfeeding in this community.

And you failed to mention these “unethical” methods that you would use.

Read full topic

item.title: Client error code. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:10, topic:428633”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=531324.msg3881970#msg3881970 date=1326094775]

How about fix the errors yourself. You will learn much more from fixing the errors yourself, than going to a source that has no errors.

The most important thing about programming, that most people fail to realize, is problem solving.

He downloaded HybridPvP with a missing bracket. He can’t fix that.
I mean I probably could but my methods are “un-ethical” in a sense.
[/quote]

You understand nothing about problem solving.

Tell us, what are these “unethical” changes?[/quote]
Well I don’t know how you code or program.
But if I ever get the missing bracket error I first read the last line in it for what file it is in (it does tell you). Then I open that file in Notepad++ and search “{” and “}”
One will show with less brackets then the other. I just search and compare where the the jump between code is.
Say you have an open bracket missing.
You look at the open brackets in the client and compare to the close ones.
when you see two close brackets show up no open bracket in between there’s your error.

Read full topic

item.description:

[/quote]
That’s your problem right there.

Your missing a bracket somewhere. GL finding it :)[/quote]
